name: Dont Jump
description:
Our submission for the Blackthornprod game jam following the theme "Less is more" Dontjump is a 2D platformer where you're only allowed to jump so many times.  The "Less" you jump the "more" likely you are to win! Good luck hope you enjoy.

Browser Game

JTAGAmes inc.

Lead Programmer/Artist: Jon-Tyrell K. Adolpho

Producer: Ajaye Adolpho
